name: Level Up

name: Town Hall
description: Directly impact your academic experience! MULTI offers a platform for students to voice concerns and offer suggestions regarding their courses, syllabus, extracurricular activities, and anything else! These will be passed on to administration.

name: Code for Cash
description: Our semesterly Code for Cash events offer students the opportunity to learn new skills while competing to win prizes in a friendly, relaxed environment.
